title: Crystal of Atlan Tier List
description: Discover the top classes in Crystal of Atlan with our comprehensive tier list, ranking each class from S to C Tier based on their strengths and gameplay effectiveness.
heading: Crystal of Atlan Tier List
introText: Discover the top classes in Crystal of Atlan with our comprehensive tier list, ranking each class from S to C Tier based on their strengths and gameplay effectiveness.

data.itemDescription: A master of dark magic, the Warlock harnesses shadows and void energy to unleash devastating ranged attacks. He also commands crows that strike enemies in battle
A skilled warrior who fights alongside a Marionette. The Marionette slashes foes with its blades. Utilises electricity in combat to shock enemies
A tanky warrior who delivers devastating burst damage. Wielding a massive sword like Guts from Berserk, he cleaves through enemies with brute strength
A skilled fighter who controls a Marionette in battle. The Marionette attacks enemies and provides defense, ensuring the Scytheguard's safety during combat
An agile gunslinger who dual-wields firearms to overwhelm enemies with rapid fire. She can unleash a swirling attack while evading with incredible speed
Similar to the Scytheguard, she fights alongside a Marionette. However, her Marionette prioritizes offense, dealing heavy damage rather than defending
A heavy weapons expert who wields a large cannon to blast enemies. She can deploy turrets that track and fire at targets, excelling in explosive damage
A magic user who harnesses elemental powers in battle. As a ranged class, he can wield fire, thunder, and other elements to unleash powerful attacks
A ranged combatant armed with a single pistol. A solid choice for those who prefer attacking from a distance
A swift fighter who wields a magically infused blade. Agile and quick, she slashes enemies in rapid succession
